Dear Waldot
Thought you would like to know that Harold Hill may
be a little late getting hie next batch of votes in* (He
suggested that X mention this to you*) He le on vacation
until the end of July, and he will thereafter be tied up
for a week or so with budget problems. But he* 11 be back
In the groove just as quickly as possible, of course.
Best regards,
Sincerely,
JHicp
